name: Terrarium Land
description: Do explore the world`s levels, find secret places, unique artifacts and bonuses. In the Terrarium Land world, destroy enemies and solve the puzzles in different levels. This colorful 3D arcade game has tons of adventure in store for you. Let it begin!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4400 (2.0 GHz) / AMD Athlon 64 4000+ (2.4 GHz) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GTS DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 960 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
